title: 074: Riots, Racism & Power
description: If you look at the riots in Baltimore and the police related incidents around the country it seems like the U.S. is going to hell in a handbasket. Is racism at the heart of this unrest? Sal, Adam & Justin share their perspective on Baltimore and other emotionally charged social issues in the media. We have promised to Pump Your Mind, so here you go!...

Is racism at the heart of this unrest? Sal, Adam & Justin share their perspective on Baltimore and other emotionally charged social issues in the media. We have promised to Pump Your Mind, so here you go!...
